title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, November 5, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss describes camp life, troop enlistment, and miscellaneous news about friends and neighbors, a church meeting, and Northern opinion of the war.
keywords: Camp Life, Enlistment, National Government, African Americans, Slavery, Women, Church/Religious Activity, Home Front, Family, American Civil War
